website_summaries.verdict: Basic golf set that's perfect for novice players ages 8 and below. Offered at a great price.
pros: Includes putter, wood, and 5-, 7-, and 9-iron clubs, which is the perfect starter set
Distinctive pink highlights on the clubs and bag that kids will love
Build quality is better than expected
cons: Only has five clubs, but most young novices don't need more than that

customer_reviews.title: Nice Clubs
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 5 year old granddaughter, not realizing they were so long. I'm 5' and I could probably hit these clubs. But they were such a good deal, decided just to keep them until she is taller !!
customer_reviews.author: Tippy

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4 and 40”; I expected it to be a bit big for her which it is but she will have a lot to grow into. Great set!
customer_reviews.author: carin miller

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and not very expensive
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it for her 5th birthday! She’s been using them almost every day since! They are a good size too - she’ll definitely be able to use them for a few years!
customer_reviews.author: Adam K Aeschlimann

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs
customer_reviews.text: I Bought these for my 3 yo granddaughter. She is a little young for the age rating but I’m sure she will be fine when summer gets here length wise. These are really nice clubs. The bag is also very nice. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Just what she didn't even know she wanted.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter is thrilled with these pink clubs. She was taking a class but they had no left handed clubs for youth. These are a very reasonably priced answer. My husband was pleased with the quality and my daughter is entranced with their beauty. I will say that it is a bit heavy for an 8 year old to carry, but it does have a 2 shoulder harness to help with that.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic starter set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic starter set - it far exceeded our expectations, and our 5-year old loves it! This set comes with many more clubs than other children's club sets currently available at this price point, especially for a lefty. The stand up bag is awesome, and even includes a rain cover. Everything seems to be well-made and very good quality, and we think this will certainly last a few years. This is a great set to help a new golfer get started!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Girl golfers rule
customer_reviews.text: Very cute for my daughter who is apparently going to be lefty. Hard to find lefty sets that have character, and this one does. The bag is mostly black, with pink on the bottom, which is okay because she will not grow out of it. The shafts are pink, which I love. She has not hit the clubs yet since they are a Christmas present, but the quality looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Set
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 4 year old daughter. She is right handed but has a natural left hand swing at golf and baseball. This set is perfect for her. It fits her height well and can be used for several seasons. Quality is good and the price is half what the golf shops want for similar product. She has used it several times at the driving range and hits the balls 25 to 40 yards. She loves the bag and pockets for holding her practice balls. Would recommend to anyone thinking about starting off a little one with a lifes game.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter insisted on having "pink" golf clubs. I searched everywhere and thought I would give these a shot since they were not nearly as expensive as some of the other sets. While they are a bit too big for her I know she will grow into them. She really loves them and they are much nicer then I expected for the price I paid
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Happy Girl
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and well made. She loves going golfing with papaw and his friends. The clubs are sturdy and should last her awhile. The bag is not to heavy for our eight year old to carry on her own. Shipping was fast and she was so excited to have her own lefty clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Shutterbug

customer_reviews.title: Item is just As pictured
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and perfect purchase for my 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb Sawdey

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to granddaughter for her 6th birthday - she loved them.......so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: ... this for our 4 year old granddaughter - very sturdy set and she loves the pink colors
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 4 year old granddaughter - very sturdy set and she loves the pink colors. A bit big for her right now, but she'll grow into it. Good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: R/EA

customer_reviews.title: Great club set!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Perfect size for a tall 5 almost 6 year old girl.
customer_reviews.author: MDC

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter set
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my 6 year old. We have played twice, she loves tgem
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Benton

customer_reviews.title: Good little starter set and they were shipped on time ...
customer_reviews.text: Our grand daughter loves her golf club set and she seems to be hooked on golfing. Yay. Good little starter set and they were shipped on time and in good shape. Kids interested in sports is always a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome clubs - LH girls!!
customer_reviews.text: Excited to find a set of LH clubs for my 5 year old daughter, we tried the Hello Kitty set but they only come in RH. We are very pleased with the price/quality, these are terrific and all the pink touches are nice. Only complaint - the bag. Wish I could combine these clubs with the Hello Kitty golf bag.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The clubs are awesome! They came sooner than we expected and our ...
customer_reviews.text: The clubs are awesome! They came sooner than we expected and our granddaughter is thrilled! Will definitely use this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: PaulaFlanagan

customer_reviews.title: Good value, nice set of clubs
customer_reviews.text: Needed to buy left hand clubs for granddaughter for a golf camp. These came promptly and seem to be of reasonable value. She loved them. They should take her through a couple of years of instruction.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Icke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome First Golf Set
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our tall 7 year old & she is thrilled. My hubby was pleasantly surprised with the quality for the price, great price, great quality! We can't wait to hit the linx!
customer_reviews.author: C. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Really nice litlle set of clubs - just add golf balls ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice litlle set of clubs - just add golf balls and she's ready to go! Built well, and really attractive - do not look cheap and flimsy - definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Gaillard

customer_reviews.title: Clubs too long
customer_reviews.text: Too big for my five year old. The clubs are way too long. Cute set however. Will come in handy in a couple years but still had to get something else that fits her now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. My 7 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. My 7 year old loves it. It is a little big for her but she will grow into it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Nihar Pilla

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Bought for 5 year old granddaughter. Great quality. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah O. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my 4 year old granddaughter.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 4 year old granddaughter. They fit well and she loves the game of golf and her new clubs
customer_reviews.author: Fred C

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved them. Great set for her to start with
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved them. Great set for her to start with.
customer_reviews.author: ECookie

customer_reviews.title: Happy Girl
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our granddaughter - needless to say she was thrilled! Grampa is teaching her to play now...
customer_reviews.author: NJPauls

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value - and LH for girls!!
customer_reviews.text: These clubs are excellent quality, particularly for the price. My daughter loves the pink shafts and pink accents on the club heads. Bag is ok, the clubs are the emphasis. Most happy about finding lefty clubs for girls!
customer_reviews.author: Clay Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great golf clubs and bag for girls
customer_reviews.text: We were delighted with the quality of this set; the clubs are well-made and the bag is, as well. Our granddaughter is thrilled and having a great time with the set.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Chipped right away and very long for a young girl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our granddaughter's 5th birthday. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for my 8 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these golf clubs for my 8 year old daughter for Christmas. She LOVES them. The bag and clubs are just what the doctor ordered. Great starter set for any future duffer.
customer_reviews.author: WickedStorm9464

customer_reviews.title: My 5 yr old lefty loves these clubs
customer_reviews.text: perfect club set for a beginner at 5 yrs old. My Daughter carried her clubs with the straps on the bag, and was able to set it up all by herself. She is about 42" tall and the clubs are just a little too long but she is growing fast. The three clubs are perfect for her. I would very much recommend these clubs.
customer_reviews.author: cdpalmer

customer_reviews.title: Good set for kids starting to learn golf
customer_reviews.text: It is good color combination. Good set of five clubs and good bag. Easy to handle. Good design of bag and clubs
customer_reviews.author: Subhash Valanju

customer_reviews.title: Good set of clubs for kids
customer_reviews.text: The clubs were better than I expected. They are perfect for a girl of 8-9 years old. The flex on the shafts is good for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: These worked out great for my daughter who is 11 and on the taller side. She loves them! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cindy corbin

customer_reviews.title: Nice clubs
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set with everything that is needed and she loved them. The price was very reasonable also. She'll have years of enjoyment I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: First: the product description says for ages 4-7. My daughter is an average height four year old and the putter comes up to her chin. Second: the return process is a joke. Consumer pays for everything. Recommend you shop locally for a set of clubs for your kid. I had to get the shafts shortened just so that my daughter could use this set and it still ended up being cheaper than the return costs. Amazon should discontinue partnering with Golf Outlets of America until they can rectify their return policy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Potts

customer_reviews.title: Nice Intro set
customer_reviews.text: Bought set for niece. Showed up earlier than projected shipping date. Besides a small hole in the wood head cover, everything looked to be of good quality. Will wait and see how well the clubs perform as they have yet to be hit. Hope bag lasts. May use for later set.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great value and so happy to find PINK lefty clubs she can grow with
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These clubs are really nice and the price can't be beat. My daughter is 6 and 45 inches tall. They are the perfect size and look like they might fit next year too. Quality is very good and the bag is nice too. Perfect for a little lefty who has to have pink!
customer_reviews.author: Mmom

customer_reviews.title: Golf Outlets of America
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent and the customer service and delivery of product was outstanding. I highly recommend Golf Outlets of America and will be using them for every purchase I need in the future.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for some affordable clubs for my daughter. She loves the clubs and the bag and is looking forward to playing this spring.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hicklin

customer_reviews.title: Make sure if you bought lefty clubs they ship you lefty clubs
customer_reviews.text: The clubs are a hit! We will be getting our daughter lessons next season to give her a good start to the sport. The customer service was mixed (they sent righty clubs in error) and I had to stay on top of them to get the service I needed (2 calls and a fight to get Saturday delivery on a holiday weekend to fix their error). You can't beat the price and the clubs are the perfect starter set for a little girl!
customer_reviews.author: smb-nh

customer_reviews.title: Blew Us Away!
customer_reviews.text: These golf clubs totally exceeded our expectations! They were a birthday gift for our granddaughter who just turned 4. She absolutely loves them; and her grandpa (the golfer) was blown away by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set for my 6 year old. She loves that they are pink! Look forward to teaching her how to play.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a tall 7- year-old
customer_reviews.text: My great granddaughter desperately wanted a set of golf clubs. But she's left-handed, and I had trouble finding a decent, inexpensive set for her. This was it. She was so excited when she opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jr. Clubs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these clubs for my 3 yr. old daughter. however they are a little long for her, but I cut off 2 inches and put on new grips and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: daryl smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For my Grand daughter---she loved the set and I loved the price and quick shipping!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Golf Girl Lefty Junior Club Set w/ Pink Stand Bag
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled at the condition the golf clubs arrived in. Service was great and the clubs arrived when I was told they would. Great job.. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Description says 4 to 7 and this is not the case. Product is nice, but far too big for 4 to 7.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 5 year old and she loves them. They are a little too big for her but she'll grow into them soon enough. Great clubs for the money, other stores were twice as much. I would reccomend these clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Vin

product_meta.title: Golf Girl Junior Golf Club Set with Stand Bag
feature_bullets: Four way divider and four exterior pockets
Comes with an headcover for driver
A stand bag with double shoulder strap and umbrella holder
